title: Strategies to Improve Reading Comprehension for 3rd Graders Using a Tiered Reading Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic reading proficiency and possession of secondary-level scientific background knowledge
context.additional_context: Customized literacy enhancement program using science curriculum-based reading materials.

learning_goals: Learners will achieve a 10% or higher improvement in comprehension scores on standardized reading assessments after six months.
Learners can analyze core information in scientific texts—causal relationships, sequence, and fact/opinion distinctions—with 85% accuracy.
Learners can practice critical reading strategies at least once a week using small-group activities and digital tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
